        public void act​(Board board,
                int option)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                game.util.InvalidChoiceException
        excute the action of the demeter player
        Parameters:
        board - the board
        option - if option is 0 then we create a interactive actions List, otherwise the actions will be automatic
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception
        game.util.InvalidChoiceException - if the choice is not valid

      • placeInitialArmy

                      throws game.util.CantBuildException,
                             game.util.NoMoreRessourcesException,
                             game.util.InvalidChoiceException
        allow the player to build a army, it will be used to build the first two armies in the game
        Parameters:
        board - the board
        lc - lischooser with earth
        lcNumber - list chooser with number
        Throws:
        game.util.CantBuildException - if you can't build
        game.util.NoMoreRessourcesException - if the choice is invalid
